One stop shop for all business SMS needs

Textlocal allows you to manage your contacts, send transactional and promotional SMS from Web UI, APIs and mobile apps, manage opt-ins and opt-outs, receive SMS via short/long codes and keywords, and much more from one single platform!

Wide range of integration options

Whether you're looking for powerful APIs, easy-to-use web interface, Email to SMS gateway, Android/iOS apps or a simple Excel plugin, we’ve got you covered. Sending SMS has never been so easy and flexible!
